title: Safety 1st Easy Grip Brush and Comb, Raspberry
description: Think pink. Bring a cheerful splash of color to your baby's grooming routine with the easy grip brush and comb by safety 1st. The chunky ergonomic handles that are perfect for both you and your child to hold. The hairbrush has soft bristles that are extra gentle on your baby's sensitive scalp and the comb's dual density teeth let you adjust it for the thickness and dampness of your baby's hair.
